name: Tannery
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The tannery has a pungent, industrial atmosphere with the overwhelming scent of tanning chemicals and the sound of hides being processed and the rhythmic work of leather production. The air carries the promise of durable leather goods and the essential nature of hide processing, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of industrial transformation and the danger of working with caustic chemicals.
